title: Quick Gameplay Thoughts March 29
body:
Howdy friends, posting this one on Meddler's behalf!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------    
**Usual Disclaimers**

These posts will often contain talk about future work we're doing, or planning to do, that isn't yet guaranteed to ship. The nature of the work could change or, depending on what we discover, projects mentioned may get delayed or even stopped. If you'd like to see a Tweet whenever a new one of these posts goes up: https://twitter.com/RiotMeddler
----------------------------------------------------------------------------    
**No posts from me for a bit**

I won't be posting much during April since I'll be off work for a while on paternity leave. You should see posts on a range of topics from others instead though. Talk to you folks again in a bit!
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/6.24.1/img/champion/Ziggs.png

replies.body:
Oh! Congratulations on the new baby to Riot Meddler then! :) Glad to see that even the guys get parental leave in the case of a new baby! Happy adventures with the little one. 

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

Hello,designer, i am a Chinese player, it is so difficult to come here and create a discussion. Although my English is not good enough like local players. However, this article is my painstaking effort, i earnestly request designer and balance team can see and think about this. I spent a lot of time to write this. This article was sent to many website in China, it had many comments and agreements in different websites in China such as bilibili, Baidu post Bar, NGA, Weibo, Zhihu and so on. Clearly, it can represent many ideas of Chinese players. The topic is "Full analysis and advice about the rework of Akail" This is the text:

I am a challenger player on Akali in S6 and S7. I think new Akali is not a successful rework.

Since the new version of Akali came out, it can be said that it was frequently boarded on the LOL Pro League (LPL, LCK and so on) , and general players have followed this. This champion can always appear in "TOP 10 operation show" matches in Pro league. However, in ordinary games, the win rate of Akali haven't higher than 50%, especially in mid line (always in about 45%, and lower than 40% in 9.3).The balanced team nerfed her constantly since she was reworked. Actually, her performance is not actually very showy in Pro league. However, what is the reason that she always can appear in Pro league.

1, Stability advantage on top line, in LPL, most professional player afraid solo killed in the match, once they was solo killed by other professional players, there are many news in each forum and board talking about their performance. Obviously, Akali can suppress most champions on top line, when she get a litter advantage, she can kill other champions continuously. We know Pro leagure is not same as ordinary games, the other line usually do not have the condition like our teammates get 0/5, 0/6. Therefore, this champion can make stable advantage and get continuous pressure in her line before 9.3. This is the first reason why she can appear in Pro league but has low win rate in rank.

2, is the distance between the player in rank and Pro league, this is like the conditon of Azir and Ryze. These two champions is not easy to balance. When you buff them slightly, they will dominate Pro league, however, in ordinary games and ranks, their win rates is really too low. Akali is similar to them. Why? Because the teammates in the pro league is different to ordinary games. I know there is a word "troll" in English. This behavior is much more common in Chinese server. The reworked Akali can not solo carry a game. In the Pro league match, the teammates never troll in any game. Therefore, her advantages can be brought to whole team and “operating”(in Chinese) in a game.

I usually follow the forum of American server, the most views about Akali is "Frustration" on her W. It means the enemy always feel bad because of her W. She can repeat QA QA in her W, and the enemy can not counterattack， even those champions who have directive skills. This makes the experience of enemy become very bad. When they killed Akali, they also feel being played by Akali. This is "Frustration"

However, is this experience to the enemy gives Akali players a good experience?

My answer is "No" "Never"

The reason is so easy, because Akali players can not win the game. Many American players only know about frustration, but they didn't think about the problem that Akali can not win a game.

It is true that her solo kill ability and making "frustration" ability are good. However, she can not win the game even though she killed enemies many times. Why?

1, The first reason is Akali does not have a "snowball" ability which an assassin should have. This snowball is not saying about solo kill on the line, it's the ability that helping team and teammates, then go to win. I know the designer emphasize nerfing Akali's snowball ability when she was reworked. However, new Akali's snowball ability is even weaker than Leblanc, Zed. Well-known, in general rank games, Leblanc and Zed is easy to solo kill on their line, but after they killed their enemies for some times, they still can not win this game. This problem on Akali is more serious, compared with them, her skill R has one of the longest 120 cooldown in league of legend, as an assassin. She don't have a continuous fight ability in the game. After she used her R, she is too foolish to the enemy who know her skill combination. In addition, Her fighting ability is rely on her W. If she does not have W, she always can only "ob" her teammates and enemies fights. I think is not a good mechanism. In her W and QA QA, I don't think this is a good design. It decreases the explosive speed of an assassin and making "frustration" on her enemy.

2, The limited clearing minions ability. The energy cost of Akali's Q is too high, only using two times "Q", her energy will be very low. Except in the advantage condition, Akali's Q even can not kill a long-distance minion. After she cleaning the minions, she does not have any fighting ability because of no energy. Therefore, her solo "cleaning minions" ability is too weak. When she cleaning some minions, she does not have any energy to strike back if other enemy champions come.

3, is the killing speed of an assassin. She always can kill many enemies before 20 min in this game. However, it is useless, in the later game, akali always die in “unknown AOE” because she can not make killing faster. The passive skill of her has high damage, but is relative too slow in later game. This is similar to Leblanc in S7. Her passive is too slow in later game, too. To that Leblanc, i think the designer can reduce the passive time (1.5s) in later time. Maybe 1.5s in lv1, 1s in lv 9, 0.5s in lv 15. Then decrease her damage growth. I think this will be a good adjustment. However, that Leblanc is not exist. I will not talk more suggestions about her. Nevertheless, this ways is not suitable to Akali, because her passive value is not easy to change like reduce circles in later game and move speed. Overall, killing speed is really too important to an assassin in later game. It has a positive correlation to the ability of making chance.

Ok, these three points is the reason why she can not win the game, even though she get lots of kills. (Maybe my expression in English is not very accurate, if you want to know more accurate about this, you can ask professional interpreter to translate my Chinese version, if this article is really useful) So, this is the most failure place i think about the rework of Akali.

New Akali's skill mechanism is really not good. The biggest balance problem is her W, however, not like S6 and S7 Akali, her W decide her whole ability of fights. She only can fight with the enemies when W is not in the cooldown. In addition, why old Akali's W does not have any "Frustration", because when old Akali need to attack enemy, she always appear longer time to attack enemy. In this time, other emenies can use any methods to counter her.

About your buffs on 9.4 or 9.5. I think about this for a long time, it is really not easy to buffs her. such as: reduce her Q energy cost, reduce cool down of R and adding AP suck blood. These changes might change a little bit win rate of her. But her problem is W, if W is too weak, akali will stay on the ground. If W is too strong, she will dominate Pro league and bring "Frustration".

I still think old Akali is better, the biggest reason is she can win the game. Her line and solo kill ability in early game is not really good. But she can get advantage in the group fight in early game. It is true that "smurf" can bring negative experience to lower division rank players, however, this is the problem of "smurfs", not old Akali's players' problems. You should try to reduce the amount of "smurfs". In Master and Chanllager even diamond rank , old Akali is really a balanced champion. Her total win rate is always near to 50%(49%-50%) The players who really have higher skills on her can use distinctive operation to win a game. I don't want you delete this distinctive champion. Her ability is unique and interesting (at least no Frustration on enemy players) She has clear weakness and merits. Please think about adjust back to old Akali. To tell the truth, after the rework of Akali, my gaming time on LOL is decreasing about 70%. I just feel boring when i use new Akali that i can not carry this game due to the reason of "troller". I only can report them after the game and feel annoyed. However, these troll players still always exist in the rank game when i play the game. This is true "Frustration" to me. When i play old Akali, i always have feeling that i can win this game. But now, i only can win the game when my teammates have a good performance (at least not "troll"). I feel really so sad, and now, i can not achieve challenger in the first server in China.

"Maybe one day she will come back along that way, but this will be decided by herself." This is your background story about Akali. When i see this, i feel lacrimal. I am waiting for the day which she can come back... that girl. Akali

This article was translated by myself and the author of Chinese version is me too. Maybe my English translation is not actually good enough, if you think it make sense. Please think about this and let Chinese staffs go to that Chinese website to have a look. I really hope designer and balance team can think about the opinion of players, not only in LOL Pro league matches.

Thanks for your reading!
14/02/2019

Xxxyyy MasterYyyi

I tried to type this many times, just hope you can see this.

Old Akali wasn’t healthy for the game in anyway.

Her ult being point and click while having 3 charges gave her immense pressure in lane and if she managed to get ahead in anyway, there was NOTHING you could do to get away from her.

I would like to add that her Q+passive makes some matchups literally unplayable.

Like vs Riven, her Q is impossible to dodge or miss because of how fast and huge it is unless you're blatantly out of range.

So if a Riven in this setup wants to engage in her at all she has to take damage. She'll need to use one or even two of her dashes to be able to get off damage because Akali gets to walk away quickly but if you do engage on her she gets that huge bonus damage from her passive for free. So it's either take minor damage and walk away or major damage just get trade with her. I think her new kit is really cool but genuinely unfun and annoying to play against. 

Sure there are people that can handle her but I makes some matchups so difficult it feels like it's not even remotely fair.

> Xxxyyy MasterYyyi
> 
> I tried to type this many times, just hope you can see this.

Great job with this article.  I hope this gathers momentum bc Akali is definitely not a healthy design.

With every evolution riot makes there is a learning curve and I have found many really skilled Akali players with the new rework personally i like it and as for ranking you either grind and learn or fail put simply, but there is always a way to break a character in a game, you just have to find it for example to run the risk of a Nerf haha {{champion:18}} Is powerful but if you combine her with demolish you can literally 2 shot towers, I'm disgusting i know haha but the thing I'm getting at is try to figure out where your Akali game fits, play with some builds and try different positions. also keep up with the meta to follow the changes.

Also this topic was talking about an update about a staff member who is going to be a parent, and wont be online for quite some time. So this whole topic is irrelevant. Regardless congrats admin, I wish you many happy years of parenting and I hope your child will be what you seek be it a girl or boy.{{sticker:sg-lux}}  {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
Your whole "Akali cannot win a game" applies to Nocturne as well. Riot doesn't care.
So, uhhhh. Riot Aether! What are your gameplay thoughts? The floor's all yours!
lol you don't want my gameplay thoughts, I'm not a dev so I don't have to be reasoned or objective with my answers
kinda makes me want to hear your opinion more now...
Now I *really* want to hear it.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotAether,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=o3EqFAA2,comment-id=00150000,timestamp=2019-03-29T18:06:58.560+0000)
>
> lol you don't want my gameplay thoughts, I'm not a dev so I don't have to be reasoned or objective with my answers

Any chance you can tell us if the crit rework that removes its output RNG (That was told us was planned a couple of times over the past years) is still a thing, or has it just been canned?
Hey Meddler! First off congrats on the new Sapling! Second, you mentioned last week there would be some discussion on the state of {{champion:50}} Any details on if he'll get some love?

Swain seems to be doing alright by the numbers right now so the team doesn't have immediate plans for changes

......also are you implying SapMagic is the other father?
Depends. Are you denying that his is the father?

Well you gotta love gossip, but I don't think she/he is very happy about you saying that haha, you may have to expect a visit from {{champion:412}}  because he is gonna want your soul when Riotaether, and meddler is finished with you.

It was said that the Zed buffs were predicted to only raise his ban rate about 1%. It appears this was wrong, as he now sits in S tier for 2 lanes, and is banned in 50% of all games, up from 37% a few patches ago. Are you finally satisfied that he's now received enough welfare to be boosted into pro play, and was it really worth making the player base miserable in the process? How long do we have to wait before you start walking this problem backwards?
How melodramatic.
Before leaving can we know if you (or the one working on Wukong)  will make a thread to explain changes or goal ?? Or if you will open a discussion with Wukong mains (subreddit).

Wukong work isn't far enough along to ship while Meddler is out, so we'll likely hold off on discussing it broadly until some point after he gets back and has a chance to catch back up with everything that happened on League while he was out

As much as I don't like tagging on posts like this, I kinda want to ask about something important:
Is this gonna affect the changes for Aatrox that were slated to be worked on in 9.7 (then got removed, so guessing something will happen in 9.8)? I feel like one easy way to fix the dash issue is removing Q1 and putting it on W and instead of knocking up or doing bonus damage, it slows all targets hit. That way Aatrox will have easier access to his consistent damage output he's been lacking.
I'm still interested in when supports get a gold item mechanic that isn't gutted to prevent abuse from other lanes.
This. So much.
Hey, What is the current state of {{champion:134}} ? Do you think she is going to get a buff soon? or a buff to her mana pool?

Congratulations!


I still want to ask about the Garen buffs on PBE right now.
Why do you keep buffing his tankyness? What makes him so bad is how little damage he does. Even when getting into the enemy backline later in the game, he doesn't do enough damage, to the point where most ADCs can straight up facetank him, even worse if they actually do kite or gets help from their team.
I would love to see some E damage buffs.
What he actually needs is some % damage that is physical and not on his ult.
I was suggesting for a while, to remove the % damage from his ult, and make it a flat execute like Riven R, and in return give him some % damage on his E.
If you need to, just remove his villain mechanic to balance it out. Nobody likes that anyway.

Or remove some of this tankyness. The tankyness his W gives him is honestly insane, but not dying doesn't help when you deal no damage.

Also, his E getting tics per level feels horrible. I'd much prefer flat 8 tics or something across all levels, and maybe put the level scaling into the damage part, if you think he needs that. Although that is just a preference QoL thing.
Asol is struggling in the midlane, lack of damage mana problems cause of all the rune changes/ap items getting nerfed his ulty dooesnot provide any dmg until 3 items do u have any plans for him?

> [{quoted}](name=Diablo v2,realm=EUW,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=o3EqFAA2,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2019-03-29T16:49:03.015+0000)
>
> Asol is struggling in the midlane, lack of damage mana problems cause of all the rune changes/ap items getting nerfed his ulty dooesnot provide any dmg until 3 items do u have any plans for him?

Yes, hes clearly struggling with his 55% wr.
Any changes planned to help Galio viable in mid lane while tunning down the support galio in competitive?
When vayne nerfs?
Enjoy your paternity leave if you see this! Good luck and enjoy the time to bond with your child. Also congrats.
Congratulations Meddler for becoming a dad! Should we call you Daddy Meddler? Meddler Daddy? Medadler?
Anything for Zac please? His R is currently bugged, I reported 1 week ago.{{champion:154}}
What's the bug? I found your post saying his R is bugged but can't find a description of what you ran into.

After charging R, Zac loses the "unstoppable" status whlist mid air. It started happening since patch 9.6.

You can try in practice mode jumping out of Veigar cage without getting stunned; or watch old videos, notice the word unstoppable doesn't disappear halfway!! Let me know if you read this comment.  ~ would love some buffs for his base armor and early game.{{champion:154}}

I like Zac a lot but it's rough out there. I think what Zac really needs is the lv1 E on a shorter cool down. Another thing I think would be cool is more range on the R (when tapped for the quick pop move) would really make it feel like zac has another play.

Look at his play he needs some love.

I know its been said zac skins are hard to make but common I dont think chromas will mean you can never sell skins. 

Yee{{champion:268}}

Pretty sure some Zac players are experiencing his Ult cancel right after you use it while they are trying to charge it or something.

https://www.reddit.com/r/thesecretweapon/comments/b5rcz0/what_causes_zac_ult_to_cancelled/

Not sure if it's an actually bug or miss input, but seems a lot of people think it's bugged.

Could there be any considerations to making AP Shaco/ Shaco Support viable? The changes to make boxes proc comet and liandires were great, but could we also see E damage being adaptive and the ability for boxes to proc spellthief’s edge?
Congrats btw, enjoy your time off!
Take as much time as you need Meddler
I'm not a fan of Meddler as a game developer/designer. As a father he will be the best. Congrats to your wife and you, Meddler.
Congrats :D

Bring back old aatrox

congratz btw
Any talk about the hinted Ahri rework?
What hint? Where can I see?

https://mobile.twitter.com/RoryAlderton/status/1106372852284944385


https://www.reddit.com/r/AhriMains/comments/b6nu18/walk_animation_update_not_coming_until_rework_if/

There's a couple of Cho'Gath bugs on the live servers right now. With a buff on the horizon, is there a chance that these will be fixed? 
Off the top of my head: 
Q Visual bug where the animation goes off twice. 
R bug where if you ult a minion as your teammate kills it, your ult goes on cooldown and you do not get a stack (sometimes happens with champions too)
R Indicator still showing when your ult will not kill a target due to a shield proc when they are at low health (Blitz mana barrier, Phantom Dancer, Steraks Gage). R indicator fading in or out, making it a crap shoot whether or not it will actually kill a marked target due to the delay before it appears/vanishes.

The R bugs are especially harmful.
Is what him and Kayle do of being able to hit enemies through Teemo's blind working as intended?

Haven't been on the boards for a while, sorry for necro. 

I've never been able to hit a teemo who has blinded me. Vorpal Spikes (E) can damage him because it's a spell rather than a basic attack/onhit (and I assume you refer to kayle's waves when you say hitting through teemo blind?) 
So I'd tentatively say yes? But I'm not sure.

Yeah people just pick Cho'Gath or Kayle to counter me if I pick Teemo and it's very frustrating since they still have a lot of power that they can hit me/us with, it's as if I didn't disable them at all. If you slow the Teemo down with your Vorpal Spikes, it should be a simple matter to finish him off, just like any other champion. And Kayle's going to be able to unleash her full fury against an enemy team despite being blinded, which can result in him contributing even less than he usually would, both as a duelist and as a team fighter. Teemo's supposed to be able to  deny champions from doing stuff like that, but he's rather helpless against those 2 champions in particular. 

I've had to stop playing him and I'm waiting for his mini-rework to play him again.
